views.markdown:
CHANGE your iPhone's location as you wish. A perfect match for Facebook, Twitter, WeChat, Pokemon GO, Uber and other location-based apps.

support all iOS versions(5.1.1~13.2.3), and all iOS devices(iPhone 4/4S/5/5S/5C/6/6+/6S/6S+/7/7+/SE/8/8+/X/XR/Xs/Max/11/11Pro)。支持所有iOS系统(5.1.1~13.2.3)版本及设备(包括iPhone 4/4S/5/5S/5C/6/6+/6S/6S+/7/7+/SE/8/8+/X/XR/Xs/Max/11/11Pro), iPad, iPod Touch. 完美兼容最新13.2.3越狱
Contact tinyapps@qq.com anytime you like. 有任何问题，均可直接联系邮件客服

Fake GPS is an app with which you can change your iPhone/iPad's current location as you wish. After setting a fake location with just a long press on a map view, all location-based apps(like Facebook, Twitter, Line, Wechat, etc) on your device immediately believe you are there.

1. fix a network connection bug. 2. 1. User experience refined: faking status will be kept after you select a new location. This feature will make location faking for FindMyiPhone better.
2. Pokemons' realtime coordinates bug fixed.
3. Support FindMyFriends.

1. 优化操作模式。定位修改状态将在选择新位置后继续保持，无需重新开启定位修改。将让查找我的iPhone的定位修改更完美。
2. 修复Pokemon精灵的实时坐标有时候无法显示完整的bug。
3. 增加“查找朋友”的支持。
4. 修复在iOS 7上，关闭定位修改的时候后状态没有刷新的bug。
